translator: Mary Pukui, Hawaiian Text edited by Puakea Nogelmeier

lines.hawaiian_text: E kuʻu belle o ka pō laʻilaʻi
lines.english_text: My belle of the clear night

lines.hawaiian_text: Ka lawe mālie a ka mahina
lines.english_text: When the moon shines in its tranquility

lines.hawaiian_text: Kōaniani mai nei e ke ahe
Āhea ʻoe hoʻolono mai
lines.english_text: Oh, when will you  listen to me

lines.hawaiian_text: Āhea ʻoe, āhea ʻoe
ʻOe hoʻolono mai
I nei leo nahenahe
Adios, adios ke aloha
E ka hauʻoli ʻiniki puʻuwai
lines.english_text: O happiness that grips the heart

lines.hawaiian_text: E ke aloha e maliu mai ʻoe
Ke hoʻolale mai nei e ke Kiu
lines.english_text: The Kiu breeze brings a message

lines.hawaiian_text: Ua anu ka wao i ka ua
lines.english_text: That the forest is made cold by the rain

lines.hawaiian_text: Hoʻokahi kiss Dew drops he maʻū ia
lines.english_text: One kiss As cool as a  dew drop, will do

lines.hawaiian_text: E ka belle o ka noe līhau
lines.english_text: O belle of the ice cold mist

lines.hawaiian_text: Eia au lā e ke aloha
Ke huli hoʻi nei me ka neo
Aia i Mauna Kilohana
ʻO aʻu lehua ʻula i ka wao
lines.english_text: My red lehua of the forest

lines.hawaiian_text: Nā maka ʻohe kiʻi i ka wai
ʻĀhaʻi ka ʻiʻini a ka manaʻo
lines.english_text: And carry off the desire of the heart

lines.hawaiian_text: By and by hoʻi mai ʻoe
lines.english_text: By and by you will return

lines.hawaiian_text: E he ʻala hoene i ka poli
lines.english_text: O fragrance that soflty flutters my heart

lines.hawaiian_text: By and by hoʻi mai ʻoe
lines.english_text: By and by you will return

lines.hawaiian_text: I ʻaneʻi kāua e laʻi ai
lines.english_text: Here you and I will spend our days in rapture

lines.hawaiian_text: E ʻae ana paha wau i ka ualo
lines.english_text: I shall perhaps yield to the urge

lines.hawaiian_text: I ka leo hea a ka pololei
lines.english_text: To the calling voice of the land shell

lines.hawaiian_text: E hoʻi aku nō wau e pili
lines.english_text: E       shall return to be close

lines.hawaiian_text: Me ka ua Kīpuʻu o ka nahele
lines.english_text: With the Kīpu`u rain of the forest

lines.hawaiian_text: Me he ua noe ala ko aloha
lines.english_text: Like a misty rain is your love

lines.hawaiian_text: E hana mau nei kuʻu nui kino
ʻO kou kai ia e  mākoi ai
lines.english_text: It is the love which you tender

lines.hawaiian_text: Uʻi ʻaʻā ia pua i ka nani
E hoʻi i ka pili
E kuʻu ipo.
E neneʻe mai, e nanea mai
E ke aloha,
E hoʻonipo kāua
He lei wehi ʻoe
No kuʻu nui kino.
Lei ʻala hoʻōnaona lua i ka poli
E ke aloha,
E hanu lipo kāua
Ka nehe a ke kai
O Kahakuloa
Kai koʻo hākuʻi piʻi ka pali
Pulu pē iho kāua
Puana ʻia mai
E kuʻu ipo.
E neneʻe mai. e nanea mai
E ke aloha,
E hoʻonipo kāua
Anoʻai iā ʻoe e Waiʻanae
lines.english_text: A greeting to you o Waianae

lines.hawaiian_text: Ka piʻina i ka malu o ka ulu kukui
lines.english_text: The scent in the shade of the kukui groves

lines.hawaiian_text: Ka ʻiʻini i ka maile pili aloha
lines.english_text: For the desire to gather maile, cherished and beloved

lines.hawaiian_text: Ke ʻala mapuana i ka makani ahe
lines.english_text: The fragrance that is carried on the soft breeze

lines.hawaiian_text: Ke welina mai ka uka e Waiʻanae
lines.english_text: A fond greeting from the uplands of Waianae

lines.hawaiian_text: Uluwehi i te oho o ka palai
lines.english_text: Verdant in the lushness of palapalai fern

lines.hawaiian_text: Ka moena i haliʻi te awāwa
lines.english_text: Like a blanket it covers the valley

lines.hawaiian_text: Honi ana i ta ua koni i ka ʻili
lines.english_text: And is kissed by the light rain that chills the skin

lines.hawaiian_text: Aloha e ka pali e Waiʻanae
lines.english_text: Love to the cliffs of Waianae

lines.hawaiian_text: I nā lima hanapaʻa i ke ʻala hoʻoheno
lines.english_text: In the hands that work remain the fragrance of infatuation

lines.hawaiian_text: Ke ʻala o ka maile hihi ke kukui
lines.english_text: The scent of maile entangled in the kukui trees

lines.hawaiian_text: Ka lei o ka lei kau i ka umauma
lines.english_text: The lei that adorns a man's broad chest

lines.hawaiian_text: Eia ka hana hoʻi a ke aloha
lines.english_text: So here then is the labor of love

lines.hawaiian_text: Nā uʻi uluwehi o ka ʻāina
lines.english_text: The many beauties that adorn the land

lines.hawaiian_text: Hili ʻia e ka maile me ka palai
Anoʻai ke welina aloha ē
lines.english_text: A greeting, a fond greeting of love

translator: Kanani Mana. Hawaiian Text edited by Puakea Nogelmeier

lines.hawaiian_text: Listen to           Green Carnation  on YouTube    http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CJBAgW6iHtY
lines.english_text: My sweetheart, my blossom, my wreath

lines.hawaiian_text: Kuʻu ipo, kuʻu pua, kuʻu lei
Green carnation onaona
Wili  ʻia me maile lau liʻi
Lei nani makamae
Liʻa wau i kou nani
Hoa pili  no mī nei
lines.english_text: I am blessed with your love

lines.hawaiian_text: Lei mai ana iaʻu  kou aloha
Kuahiwi nani ʻoe Haleakalā
Kaulana hoʻi ʻoe kū kilakila
ʻO Makawao ia ua kaulana
I kāohi ia iho o ka lāʻau
He ʻŪkiu e ka ua o ka ʻāina
lines.english_text: At Makawao, this rain is well

lines.hawaiian_text: E aho no ʻoe a e komo mai
Puana ka inoa i lohe ʻia
Kuahiwi nani ʻoe Haleakalā
lines.english_text: name of the rain of this land

lines.hawaiian_text: Kaulana kuʻu home puni Waipiʻo
lines.english_text: Famous is my home,  beloved Waipiʻo

lines.hawaiian_text: Me nā peʻa nani o ka ʻāina
lines.english_text: And the beautiful borders of the land

lines.hawaiian_text: Kākela he hale aliʻi
Herode koʻu hoalike
Mōʻī puni haʻakei
Kukuna o ka lā koʻu kapa ʻia
lines.english_text: Rays of the sun are my garments

lines.hawaiian_text: E ʻōlino nei a puni ka honua
Aue aʻi luna lilo
lines.english_text: Far above, so high, beyond reach

lines.hawaiian_text: Lihi launa ʻole mai
Nā aliʻi nui o ke ao
lines.english_text: For the great lord of the day

lines.hawaiian_text: E oʻu mau kini nā makamaka
Me nā kupa o kuʻu ʻāina
Me ka wailele aʻo Hiʻilawe
Koʻiawe maila i luna
Koʻiawe mau i ka pali
ʻAʻole pēlā ka ʻoia ʻiʻo
Hakuʻepa lokoʻino o ka makamaka
lines.english_text: Gossip started by a jealous crony

lines.hawaiian_text: Ua like nō a like
Me nā kini lehulehu
O kuʻu one hānau
E ola māua me aʻu kini
lines.english_text: May the two of us and my friends

lines.hawaiian_text: Me aʻu lei o nei ʻāina
lines.english_text: And my children live in this land

lines.hawaiian_text: Pulupē i ka hunakai
Ka iʻa mili i ka lima
lines.english_text: Where fish are caught in the hand

lines.hawaiian_text: Heha Waipiʻo i ka noe
lines.english_text: Waipiʻo is drowsy in the mist

lines.hawaiian_text: Haʻina ʻia mai ana ka puana
No ka lei hapa pua Sēpānia
lines.english_text: Of this half Spanish flower lei

lines.hawaiian_text: He kupa no ka ʻāina
E kipa mai ma loko
lines.english_text: You are welcome to come to

lines.hawaiian_text: Haleʻiwa beautiful home
Ma ke alahele ʻo Iesû
Me ke kanaka ʻōpio hanohano
Pane mai e ka ʻōpio
He aha hoʻi kaʻu e hana aku ai
I loaʻa e ke ola mau?
E hāʻawi, e hāʻawi lilo
Huli a hahai mai iaʻu
I loaʻa e ke ola mau ia ʻoe
Minamina e ka ʻōpio
I kona mau waiwai
I ka poʻe nele a hune
Huli aʻe ʻo Iesū lā
Pane aku i ka ʻōpio
I ke aupuni o ka lani
ʻO ka   hīnano   o   Puna   kuʻu   liʻa
lines.english_text: The hinano of Puna is my desire

lines.hawaiian_text: E   lauwiliwili   ai   kaʻiʻiʻni
Nipo  ninipo   hoʻi   i   ke   aloha
Ka   lehua   haʻalewa   lā     i   ke   kai
lines.english_text: Is the lehua swaying by the sea

lines.hawaiian_text: ʻO   ke   kai   nehe   mai   i   ka   uluhala
lines.english_text: The rustling sea by the hala grove

lines.hawaiian_text: E   hoʻohenoheno   nei   kuʻu   nui   kino
No   Puna   ka   makani   Moaniʻala
lines.english_text: The Moani'ala wind hails from Puna

lines.hawaiian_text: E   hali hali   ana   i   kuʻu   haʻehaʻe
ʻEnaena   Puna   i   ke   ahi   a   pele
ʻUʻina   laka   huaʻinaʻi  Puʻu ʻŌʻō
lines.english_text: The gushing lava crackles at Puu 'O‘o

lines.hawaiian_text: Puʻō ke   ahi   lapalapa   i   luna
Punohunohu   i   ke   ano   ahiahi
lines.english_text: Her smoke billows in the evening

lines.hawaiian_text: Haʻina     ʻia   mai   ana   ka   puana
No   ka   hīnano   o   Puna   paia  ʻala
lines.english_text: For the hinano of Puna with fragrant walls

lines.hawaiian_text: Hʻaina   hou   mai   ana   ka   puana
No   ka   hoa   lūlana   moe   i   ke   ala
lines.english_text: For my peaceful friend who lies on the path

lines.hawaiian_text: Hui: Kainō a ʻo wau wale nō ka i ʻike I nā latitū aʻā ia aupuni Eia kā he nui loa a he lehulehu Nā pailaka o ia awa kū moku ē Loko ʻino maoli nō hoʻi ʻoe e ke hoa Ko lilo paha i ka ʻulala Aloha ʻole iho i nei kupuʻeu E ʻau hele nei i ka moana E kuhi ana paha ʻoe a e nalo ana Kāu hana hōʻehaʻeha naʻau I ka nalo ʻana aʻe o kuʻu maka Lawa pono iho ai ko makemake Aia i mua kuʻu nui kino Aia i hopekuʻu hoʻoilina I ʻaneʻi hoʻi au ʻeha ka manaʻo I ka lohe ʻana mai ua heo ʻoe
lines.english_text: Chorus: I thought that I was the only one that knew The latitude of this kingdom There are many, multitudes Pilots of this boat harbor You are truly bitter, friend You are cruel You have no love for this rascal I shall sail out to sea Perhaps you think it will vanish These things that hurt me deeply They disappear before my eyes And your desires are satisfied There up ahead is the essence of me There behind is my legacy Right here I am, with hurt feelings Having heard that you've departed

lines.hawaiian_text: ‘O ka ‘ilima nō koʻu lei
Ka liʻa ia nei puʻu wai
He wehi ia no kuʻu kino
Lei hoʻohihi a ka mana‘o
lines.english_text: It is dear to my thoughts

lines.hawaiian_text: ‘I‘ini au lā i kou nani
He hiwahiwa i ka‘u  ‘ike
lines.english_text: A charming lei to my sight

lines.hawaiian_text: ‘O wau kou hoa e kohu ai
lines.english_text: It is the companion suitable to your beauty

lines.hawaiian_text: E lei  ‘ilima ē. lei ‘ilima
ʻAuhea wale ʻoe
Mahina ʻo Hoku
Hōʻike aʻe ʻoe
Ua laʻi nā kai
Mehameha nā pali
ʻO ʻoe a ʻo wau
E hoʻoipoipo nei
E moani ke ʻala
O ka pua hīnano
E ʻapo mai ʻoe
Haʻina kou inoa
Mahina ʻo Hoku
Ke noho nani maila
Mauna lani kiʻekiʻe

primary_composer: Chris Keli‘ia‘a, Manu Boyd, Kenneth Makuakäne
composer: Chris Keli‘ia‘a, Manu Boyd, Kenneth Makuakäne

lines.hawaiian_text: Hanu i ke ʻala ou e ka pīkake
lines.english_text: I breathe in your fragrance, O sweet jasmine

lines.hawaiian_text: Haliʻa ka manaʻo i ka hui mua
lines.english_text: And am reminded of the time we first met

lines.hawaiian_text: Hana lauwiliwili me ka liʻa loko
lines.english_text: When love's desire twisted and turned within

lines.hawaiian_text: He ʻiʻini koʻu e pili me ʻoe
lines.english_text: I longed to be close to you

lines.hawaiian_text: Wrap your arms around my waist
lines.english_text: Wrap your arms around my waist

lines.hawaiian_text: Come honihoni me
Oh my goodness ku‘u pu‘uwai
Now that you are in my arms
lines.english_text: Now that you are in my arms

lines.hawaiian_text: E ula la‘e hou
Darling pili mau me ‘oe
lines.english_text: Darling I'll always be close to you

lines.hawaiian_text: Helele‘i mai ka ‘ohu noe i ka ‘ili
lines.english_text: Lightly falls the mist on your skin

lines.hawaiian_text: Hali‘ali‘a i ka ulu aloha
lines.english_text: It reminds me of when love first began to grow

lines.hawaiian_text: Pa‘a pono ‘ia la i ku‘u manawa
lines.english_text: I hold this dear to my heart, my affections

lines.hawaiian_text: He ‘i‘ini ko‘u e pili me ‘oe
lines.english_text: I long to be close to you

lines.hawaiian_text: ‘A‘ole ka mana‘o e poina wale
Ka popohe o ka pikake anuhea
lines.english_text: The shapely beauty of the cool, sweet jasmine

lines.hawaiian_text: ‘Ae no ho‘i ua poina ‘ole
Maopopo ia‘u pili mau me ‘oe
lines.english_text: It is clear - I'll always be close to you
